definitions.definition: a set of clothes that you wear together, especially for a particular occasion or purpose

examples.text: She was wearing an expensive new outfit.
a cowboy/Superman outfit *(= one that you wear for fun in order to look like the type of person mentioned)*
I'm looking for a necklace to complete my outfit.
The pair arrived in matching white outfits.

definitions.definition: a group of people working together as an organization, business, team, etc.

examples.text: This was the fourth album by the top rock outfit.
The jazz outfit is/are performing live.

definitions.definition: a set of equipment that you need for a particular purpose
